author: PTI
title: Will allow homeward journey of people stranded in UP: Yogi Adityanath
description: Taking stock of the situation, Uttar Pradesh CM also told officials to take strict action against those violating the lockdown and not adhering to the social distancing norms.
content:
LUCKNOW: Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Wednesday said their government will allow other states if they want to take home their residents stranded in Uttar Pradesh due to the coronavirus lockdown.
